build.beforeDevCommand: bash -lc 'if (command -v lsof >/dev/null 2>&1 && lsof -i :5173 -sTCP:LISTEN -t >/dev/null 2>&1) || (command -v ss >/dev/null 2>&1 && ss -ltnp 2>/dev/null | grep -q ":5173") || (command -v curl >/dev/null 2>&1 && curl -sSf http://127.0.0.1:5173/ >/dev/null 2>&1); then echo "dev server already running on :5173"; else bun run dev; fi'

security.csp: default-src 'self'; connect-src 'self' http://127.0.0.1:7777; img-src 'self' data:; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'
